[11-15] Afterwards, the video cuts to black again, this time showing the white English text "Bastei Bridge" along with a mountain and two crossed swords icon. The scene shifts to the Bastei Bridge where a person is walking towards the distance along the bridge. Towering rock walls flank both sides of the bridge, and mist permeates the air. The camera then pans to a long shot of the Bastei Bridge, showcasing the bridge spanning between two massive rock formations. Lush forests surround the bridge, and mist-shrouded peaks can be seen in the distance. The scene switches back to a close-up of the Bastei Bridge, with numerous tourists present both on the bridge and on a lower section of the bridge. Below the bridge lies a valley adorned with verdant trees.
